effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 719,952 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 277,316.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 343 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 54,117 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 123,000.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 81,573 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
